sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; const About = () => { return (

Proffesional Background


Result-oriented Software professional with{" "} 5+ years of proven success in application development, unit testing, & memory management in the Information Technology domain

Insightful Software Engineer possess adequate knowledge of  Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, Rxswift, Combine, iOS framework, React Native, Carplay, Android, C, XML (Extensible Markup Language), JSON (JavaScript Object Notation), REST API, Third-party libraries, Threading/Multi-threading, Location tracking, Agile Scrum, IoT {" "} (Internet of Things and TDD) (Test-driven development)

Adept in handling Memory Management: ARC (Automatic Reference Counting) and non-ARC in iOS development, gathering information & architecting, and familiar with both native and hybrid iOS development

Possess a unique combination of technical and analytical skills that involves analyzing client business needs to help identify business problems, analyze requirements, and provide the best business solutions

Proficient in correlating with cross-functional teams, ability to prioritize and manage tasks with timelines, and interacting with customers across hierarchical levels for smooth project execution.


); }; export default About;
